languages.text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 6 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the inevitability effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 6 stacks of inevitability, they deal <u>(Medicae / 10)</u> direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects and all the stacks of inevitability are removed.

languages.text:
Cuando el portador inflige un efecto de daño continuado o mata a un enemigo, gana +1 acumulación del efecto {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}.
En cuanto el portador gana 6 acumulaciones de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}, inflige {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} de daño directo a todos los enemigos afectados por efectos de daño continuado y pierde todas las acumulaciones de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}.

Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando el portador inflige un efecto de daño continuado o mata a un enemigo, gana +1 acumulación del efecto {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}.
En cuanto el portador gana 6 acumulaciones de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}, inflige <u>(Medicae / 10)</u> de daño directo a todos los enemigos afectados por efectos de daño continuado y pierde todas las acumulaciones de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}.

languages.text:
使用者が継続ダメージ効果を与える、または敵を倒すたび、使用者は{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}効果を+1スタック獲得する。
使用者が{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}を6スタック得ると、{uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d}の直接ダメージをあらゆる継続ダメージ効果を受けているすべての敵に与え、すべての{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}スタックが取り除かれる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 6 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

languages.text:
每当装备者施加持续伤害效果或击杀敌人时，都会获得1层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果。
当装备者拥有6层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果时，移除所有{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}层数，对所有受到持续伤害效果影响的敌人造成{uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d}点直击伤害。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.

每当装备者施加持续伤害效果或击杀敌人时，都会获得1层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果。

当装备者拥有6层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果时，移除所有{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}层数，对所有受到持续伤害效果影响的敌人造成{uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d}点直击伤害。

languages.text:
Chaque fois que le porteur inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs ou tue un ennemi, il gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}.
Au bout de 6 cumuls de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}, les cumuls sont consommés pour infliger {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} points de dégâts directs à tous les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs.{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}{/g}
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 6 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que le porteur inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs ou tue un ennemi, il gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}.
Au bout de 6 cumuls de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}, les cumuls sont consommés pour infliger <u>(Medicae / 10)</u> points de dégâts directs à tous les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs.

Chaque fois que le porteur inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs ou tue un ennemi, il gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}.
Au bout de 6 cumuls de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}, les cumuls sont consommés pour infliger {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} points de dégâts directs à tous les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger einen Gegner mit einem Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt belegt oder tötet, erhält der Träger +1 Stapel des {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g}-Effektes.
Sobald der Träger 6 Stapel {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g} hat, fügt er allen Gegnern unter dem Einfluss von Schaden-über-Zeit-effekten {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} Direktschaden zu und alle Stapel von {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g} werden entfernt.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 6 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

Sobald der Träger 6 Stapel {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g} hat, fügt er allen Gegnern unter dem Einfluss von Schaden-über-Zeit-effekten <u>(Medicae / 10)</u> Direktschaden zu und alle Stapel von {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g} werden entfernt.

Wenn der Träger einen Gegner mit einem Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt belegt oder tötet, erhält der Träger +1 Stapel des {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g}-Effektes.

languages.text:
Накладывая эффект периодического урона или убивая противника, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимость{/g}.
Как только персонаж набирает 6 уровней {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g}, он наносит {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} прямого урона всем противникам, на которых действуют эффекты периодического урона, после чего все уровни {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g} снимаются.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 6 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

traits.locale_text:
Накладывая эффект периодического урона или убивая противника, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимость{/g}.
Как только персонаж набирает 6 уровней {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g}, он наносит <u>(Медицина / 10)</u> прямого урона всем противникам, на которых действуют эффекты периодического урона, после чего все уровни {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g} снимаются.

Накладывая эффект периодического урона или убивая противника, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимость{/g}.
Как только персонаж набирает 6 уровней {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g}, он наносит {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} прямого урона всем противникам, на которых действуют эффекты периодического урона, после чего все уровни {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g} снимаются.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, zamanla hasar veren bir etkiye sebep olduğunda veya bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde +1 {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}kaçınılmazlık{/g} etkisi birikimi kazanır.
Takan kişi, 6 {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}kaçınılmazlık{/g} birikimi elde ettiğinde herhangi bir zamanla hasar veren etkiden muzdarip olan tüm düşmanlara {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} doğrudan hasar verir ve tüm {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}kaçınılmazlık{/g} birikimleri ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 6 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.
